revised_title: Observations and Experiments on a Wax-Like Substance Resembling Pe-La of the Chinese
tldr: The author examines a wax-like substance called white lac, secreted by an insect resembling the pe-la of the Chinese. The substance is compared to beeswax and has potential medicinal properties. The author conducts various experiments to analyze its properties and potential uses, including its ability to burn in oxygen gas and its reaction with concentrated acids.
